entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -2.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sault Ste. Marie Airport 2:00 PM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -2.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa falling
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 86 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -4.0°C
Wind: ENE 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries. A few flurries beginning late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending after midnight then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
